name: hoscli
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(co(c1, chos, c2), c0), chba))

stmt.origin: mpanl12(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(co(c1, chos, c2), c0), chba), wf(c1, chba, chba), wf(c2, chba, chba))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(co(c1, chos, c2), c0), chba))
-| wf(c1, chba, chba)
-| wf(c2, chba, chba)
-| wi(wa(wa(wf(c1, chba, chba), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(c0, chba)), wcel(cfv(co(c1, chos, c2), c0), chba))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(co(c1, chos, c2), c0), chba))
-| wf(c1, chba, chba)
-| wf(c2, chba, chba)
-| wi(wa(wa(wf(c1, chba, chba), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(c0, chba)), wcel(cfv(co(c1, chos, c2), c0), chba))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wa(wf(c1, chba, chba), wf(c2, chba, chba)), wcel(c0, chba)), wcel(cfv(co(c1, chos, c2), c0), chba))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(co(c1, chos, c2), c0), chba))
-| wf(c1, chba, chba)
-| wf(c2, chba, chba)

comment: Closure of Hilbert space operator sum. (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
